explains: n. 客栈老板；旅馆主人

sentences.en: It was the Innkeeper who had come to tell him that midnight had struck.
sentences.cn: 是旅馆老板来告诉他午夜已过。

sentences.en: Once upon a time, in a beautiful mountain inn, there was a greedy old innkeeper who was always thinking about money.
sentences.cn: 从前，在一个美丽的山间客栈里，有一个贪婪的老店主，他总是想着赚钱。

sentences.en: The innkeeper stood in one corner and watched the affair.
sentences.cn: 店主站在一个角落里看呆了，简直不知道说甚么好。
